description.value:
Gain +10 to Perception Tests to spot or avoid being suprised, and Survival Tests to track the relevent foe on the battlefield Kill Markers can't be acquired, only earned.

Requirements

Informal Kill Marker: Squad has Completed one Full Campaign against, or slain 75 of a particular foe. Such as Orks, Rebels, Dark Eldar, Chaos Worshippers, Kroot, Etc.

Effect: Special

Notes: -
description.summary:

Kill Markers can't be acquired, only earned.
